mdRecord.dcterms:title: L' Heptameron des nouuelles de tresillustre et tresexcellente Princesse Marguerite de Valois, Royne de Nauarre / remis en son vray ordre, confus au parauant en sa premiere impression: & dedié à tresillustre & tresvertueuse Princesse Ieanne, Royne de Nauarre, par Claude Gruget Parisien
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Marguerite Queen, consort of Henry II, King of Navarre, 1492-1549
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Signature of Thomas Smith, Queen Elizabeth's ambassador to France, on title page. Bookplate, "Ham Court." Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 290.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Tales--France
